Exercise 1 input:
5 100 1000 10000 100000 1000000 10000000 0
Exercise 1 output:
5 3 8 0
100 97 119 0
1000 871 179 1
10000 6171 262 3
100000 77031 351 35
1000000 837799 525 395
10000000 8400511 686 5071

Exercise 2 input:
5 100 1000 10000 100000 150000 180000 190000 0
Exercise 2 output:
3 14 0
70 327 0
801 1012 0
9087 1145 0
98003 1552 117
144613 1682 138
157571 2021 185
180081 2025 209
